languages.text: "Таково и желание Неумирающего. Не прошептал Он имени юного Гиорека, а значит, нам под силу исцелить его".

traits.locale_text: "Таково и желание Неумирающего. Не прошептал Он имени юного Гиорека, а значит, нам под силу исцелить его".

languages.text: "This is also the desire of the Undying One. He has not whispered the name of young Giorek, so we may heal him."
languages.original_text: "Таково и желание Неумирающего. Не прошептал Он имени юного Гиорека, а значит, нам под силу исцелить его".

traits.locale_text: "This is also the desire of the Undying One. He has not whispered the name of young Giorek, so we may heal him."
"This is also the desire of the Undying One. He has not whispered the name of young Giorek, so we may heal him."
"This is also the desire of the Undying One. He has not whispered the name of young Giorek, so we may heal him."
"This is also the desire of the Undying One. He has not whispered the name of young Giorek, so we may heal him."
"This is also the desire of the Undying One. He has not whispered the name of young Giorek, so we may heal him."

languages.text: «Esa es también la voluntad del Inmortal. No ha susurrado el nombre del joven Giorek, así que podemos curarlo».
languages.original_text: "This is also the desire of the Undying One. He has not whispered the name of young Giorek, so we may heal him."

traits.locale_text: «Esa es también la voluntad del Inmortal. No ha susurrado el nombre del joven Giorek, así que podemos curarlo».

languages.text: 「これも不死の者の望みだ。彼は若いジョレクの名をささやかなかったので、私たちは彼を癒すことができる」
languages.original_text: "This is also the desire of the Undying One. He has not whispered the name of young Giorek, so we may heal him."

traits.locale_text: 「これも不死の者の望みだ。彼は若いジョレクの名をささやかなかったので、私たちは彼を癒すことができる」

languages.text: “这也正是不死之神的愿望。祂并没有低声道出年轻的乔瑞克的名字，因此我们可以把他治好。”
languages.original_text: "This is also the desire of the Undying One. He has not whispered the name of young Giorek, so we may heal him."

traits.locale_text: “这也正是不死之神的愿望。祂并没有低声道出年轻的乔瑞克的名字，因此我们可以把他治好。”

languages.text: "Das ist auch der Wunsch des Todlosen. Er hat den Namen des jungen Giorek nicht geflüstert, also dürfen wir ihn heilen."
languages.original_text: "This is also the desire of the Undying One. He has not whispered the name of young Giorek, so we may heal him."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist auch der Wunsch des Todlosen. Er hat den Namen des jungen Giorek nicht geflüstert, also dürfen wir ihn heilen."

languages.text: « C'est également le désir de l'Immortel. Il n'a pas encore murmuré le nom du jeune Giorek, nous pouvons donc le soigner. »
languages.original_text: "This is also the desire of the Undying One. He has not whispered the name of young Giorek, so we may heal him."

traits.locale_text: « C'est également le désir de l'Immortel. Il n'a pas encore murmuré le nom du jeune Giorek, nous pouvons donc le soigner. »

languages.text: "Bu da Ölmeyen'in arzusu. Genç Giorek'in ismini fısıldamadı. Bu yüzden onu iyileştirebiliriz."
languages.original_text: "This is also the desire of the Undying One. He has not whispered the name of young Giorek, so we may heal him."
